ctx: intros p sigma u st' out ms q Hhandler Hlocks Hunlock Hnetwork.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat p : packet sigma : name -> Data u : unit st' : Data out : list Output ms : list (Name * Msg) q : packet Hhandler : NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) Hlocks : locks_correct sigma c : Client_index Hunlock : valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c q Hnetwork : LockServ_network_network_invariant p q Hbody : pBody q = Unlock Unable to unify "valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c q" with "valid_unlock (queue (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st' Server)) (held (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st' (Client c))) c q".

original: intros p sigma u st' out ms q Hhandler Hlocks Hunlock Hnetwork. unfold locks_correct_unlock in Hunlock. unfold locks_correct_unlock. intros Hbody. specialize (Hunlock Hbody). destruct Hunlock as [c Hunlock]. exists c. apply Hunlock.
